title: On the radio
author: VD
content_html:
In case you’re interested, I’m being interviewed on the Preparedness Radio Network at noon EST for an hour. They appear to have a listen live link here.

An interesting post-interview note from the host: “We’re all about the downloads here after the live shows. Already they have downloaded this broadcast nearly 1,000 times—that has never happened immediately after a show before.”
content_text:
In case you’re interested, I’m being interviewed on the Preparedness Radio Network at noon EST for an hour.  They appear to have a
listen live link here
.
An interesting post-interview note from the host:
“We’re all about the downloads here after the live shows. Already they have downloaded this broadcast nearly 1,000 times—that has never happened immediately after a show before.”
